member.name: T:LandisGyr.Globalization.Extensions
member.summary: Helper methods for retrieving localized strings from resource designators.

member.name: M:LandisGyr.Globalization.Extensions.ToLocalizedString(System.Enum,System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.Func{System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.String})
member.summary: Retrieves a localized string associated with the specified value.
member.param: An enum value whose type is decorated with a ResourceFileAttribute that identifies a resource file that includes a resource name that matches the symbolic name of the resourceDesignator.
[Optional] The culture for which the string is localized. If null or omitted, GetLocalizedString uses the current UI culture obtained from the CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture property.
[Optional] A function that assembles the localized strings for a multi-valued enum with A FlagsAttribute into a result string.
member.returns: A resource value mapped to, or assembled from, the specified enum value.
member.exception: A result-assembly function must be specified when the resource designator's enum type has a FlagsAttribute.;assembleResult
A result-assembly function cannot be specified unless the resource designator's enum type has a FlagsAttribute.;assembleResult
No symbolic name is defined for the enum value.;resourceDesignator

member.name: M:LandisGyr.Globalization.Extensions.LocalizedFormat(System.Enum,System.Globalization.CultureInfo,System.Object[])
member.summary: Retrieves a localized string associated with the specified value and uses it to format the specified arguments.
member.param: An enum value whose type is decorated with a ResourceFileAttribute that identifies a resource file that includes a resource name that matches the symbolic name of the resourceDesignator.
The culture for which the string is localized. If null, GetLocalizedFormat uses the current UI culture obtained from the CultureInfo.CurrentUICulture property.
The arguments to be substituted for placeholders found in the localized message pattern.
member.returns: A formatted string derived from the resource value mapped to the specified enum value.

member.name: M:LandisGyr.Globalization.Extensions.LocalizedFormat(System.Enum,System.Object[])
member.summary: Retrieves a localized string associated with the specified value and uses it to format the specified arguments.
member.param: An enum value whose type is decorated with a ResourceFileAttribute that identifies a resource file that includes a resource name that matches the symbolic name of the resourceDesignator.
The arguments to be substituted for placeholders found in the localized message pattern.
member.returns: A formatted string derived from the resource value mapped to the specified enum value.
member.exception: A ResourceFileAttribute must be applied to the resource designator's enum type.;resourceDesignator

member.name: T:LandisGyr.Globalization.ITemplatedMessage
member.summary: Methods to retrieve a localized verion of a culture-independent text message

member.name: M:LandisGyr.Globalization.ITemplatedMessage.ToString
member.summary: Returns the text of the ITemplatedMessage with formatted values substituted for any placeholders, localized using the thread's current culture. See remarks.
member.remarks: The ITemplatedMessage must have been initialized with a resource designator (enum value), not a simple message key (string).

member.name: M:LandisGyr.Globalization.ITemplatedMessage.ToString(LandisGyr.Globalization.CulturePolicy)
member.summary: Returns the text of the ITemplatedMessage with formatted values substituted for any placeholders, localized using the culture indicated by the specified CulturePolicy. See remarks.
member.remarks: The ITemplatedMessage must have been initialized with a resource designator (enum value), not a simple message key (string).

member.name: T:LandisGyr.Globalization.TemplatedMessage
member.summary: Encapsulation of a formattable message template, identified by a resource designator, and the values to be substituted for the template's placeholders (Ã la string.Format)

member.name: M:LandisGyr.Globalization.TemplatedMessage.#ctor(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: [Obsolete] Creates a TemplatedMessage from a string (resource) with placeholders.
member.param: The message key for a string resource with placeholders
Parameters whose values will replace the placeholders in the string identified by messageKey

member.name: M:LandisGyr.Globalization.TemplatedMessage.#ctor(System.Enum,System.Object[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: An enum value that designates the resource to be used; see remarks.
Parameters whose values will replace the placeholders in the string identified by resourceDesignator
member.exception: A ResourceFileAttribute must be applied to the resource designator's enum type.;resourceDesignator
member.remarks: The resourceDesignator is an enum value whose enum type has a ResourceFileAttribute that indirectly identifies the resource file used to resolve the resource reference. See for details. The symbolic name of the resourceDesignator value is used to find the resource via the resource file associated with the enum type.

member.name: M:LandisGyr.Globalization.TemplatedMessage.GetKnownTypes(System.Reflection.ICustomAttributeProvider)
member.summary: Enumerates the non-default types that can be serialized as or within a TemplatedMessage.
member.param: The provider.

member.name: M:LandisGyr.Globalization.TemplatedMessage.KnownTypes
member.summary: Enumerates the non-default types that can be serialized as or within a TemplatedMessage.

member.name: M:LandisGyr.Globalization.TemplatedMessage.Join(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Creates a TemplatedMessage that renders as the concatenation of the specified values with the specified separator between them.
member.param: The string to use as a separator. separator is included in the returned string only if values has more than one element.
An array that contains the elements to concatenate.
member.returns: A string that consists of the elements of values delimited by the separator string.

member.name: F:LandisGyr.Globalization.TemplatedMessage.DesignatorTypeAssyQfdName
member.summary: The assembly-qualified name of the designator (enum) type.
member.value: The assembly-qualified name of the designator type.

member.name: M:LandisGyr.Globalization.TemplatedMessage.GetText(System.Resources.ResourceManager)
member.summary: [Obsolete] Returns the localized text of the TemplatedMessage with formatted values substituted for any placeholders.
member.param: The ResourceManager to be used to resolve the specified message key. Ignored if the TemplatedMessage was created with Join() or with a resource designator (enum).

member.name: M:LandisGyr.Globalization.TemplatedMessage.ToString(LandisGyr.Globalization.CulturePolicy)
member.summary: Returns the localized text of the TemplatedMessage with formatted values substituted for any placeholders.
member.param: A value to indicate whether to use English or another culture to localize the message.
member.returns: The TemplatedMessage formatted according to the specified CulturePolicy.
member.remarks: The TemplatedMessage must have been initialized with a resource designator (enum value), not a simple message key (string).
member.exception: This method can be used only with a MessageTemplate that was initialized with a suitable enum value as a resource designator.

member.name: M:LandisGyr.Globalization.TemplatedMessage.ToString
member.summary: Returns the localized text of the TemplatedMessage with formatted values substituted for any placeholders. The localization will use the current thread's culture; see remarks.
member.returns: A that represents the localized text of the TemplatedMessage with formatted values substituted for any placeholders.
member.remarks:
The TemplatedMessage must have been initialized with a resource designator (enum value), not a simple message key (string).
If this TemplatedMessage is nested (that is, it's one of the messageParams used to create a TemplatedMessage), ToString will localize it according to the CulturePolicy of the parent TemplatedMessage.

member.name: M:LandisGyr.Globalization.TemplatedMessage.Deserialize(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a TemplatedMessage from an XML serialization
member.param: The XML-serialized message (from the Serialized property)

member.name: M:LandisGyr.Globalization.TemplatedMessage.IsSerializedTemplatedMessage(System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified text is (probably) a serialized TemplatedMessage.
member.param: The text to be analyzed.
member.returns: False if there's no way the text represents a TemplatedMessage; true if it could be.

member.name: F:LandisGyr.Globalization.TemplatedMessage.messageKey
member.summary: The name of the resource that resolves to the message format (or simple string) suitable for string.Format( )

member.name: F:LandisGyr.Globalization.TemplatedMessage.messageParams
member.summary: The message parameters (if any) that will be substituted for placeholders in the format designated by messageKey.

member.name: M:LandisGyr.Globalization.TemplatedMessage.GetProvider``1(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a provider instance of the specified type from the configuration data found at specified key.
member.param: The key, in HuntEPICSettings, that identifies the provider's type and assembly. Its format must be "assemblyName,fqTypeName".
Default type name when no configuation value overrides it.
Default assembly name when no configuation value overrides it.

member.name: P:LandisGyr.Globalization.TemplatedMessage.Empty
member.summary: Gets an empty TemplatedMessage. Use only when a non-null value is required.
member.value: An empty TemplatedMessage that renders as string.Empty regardless of culture.

member.name: P:LandisGyr.Globalization.TemplatedMessage.Separator
member.summary: Gets or sets the delimiter used for a joined message. If null, a resource designator must be specified.
member.value: The string to use as a separator. Separator is included in the returned string only if messageParams has more than one element.

member.name: P:LandisGyr.Globalization.TemplatedMessage.Serialized
member.summary: An XML serialization of the TemplatedMessage that can be deserialized with TemplatedMessage.Deserialize()
